name: Radio

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties3.name: description
properties3.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the drop-down box.

properties4.name: class
properties4.description: (optional) New in Joomla 3, if set to class="btn-group btn-group-yesno" will show the nice coloured buttons

properties5.name: option
properties5.description: (mandatory) set the options of this radio. Separate options with commas and use the pipe symbol to separate value from text.

properties6.name: default
properties6.description: (optional) is the default radio button item value.

properties7.name: message
properties7.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as error on validation.

properties8.name: required
properties8.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties9.name: validate
properties9.description: (optional) The validation method for the form field.  This value will determine which method is used to validate the value for a field.

properties10.name: readonly
properties10.description: (optional) The field cannot be changed and will automatically inherit the default value

properties11.name: disabled
properties11.description: (optional) The field cannot be changed and will automatically inherit the default value - it will also not submit

properties12.name: showon
properties12.description: (optional) Allows you to hide the field based on the value(s) of another field; for Joomla 3.2.4+ https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The radio form field type displays a set of radio buttons for selecting one option from a predefined list. If the field has a saved value, that option is selected when the page loads; otherwise, the default value (if any) is used.
